youtube.title: How Missing Teeth Change Your Face Shape: Dental Anatomy Explained
youtube.description: Discover the biological impact of tooth loss on your facial structure. This animation shows how teeth shift and bone recedes when a gap is left untreated, leading to a prematurely aged appearance. Learn why dental health is crucial for maintaining your face shape.
